hero.title: GHN Group – Exceptional Pools & Outdoors
hero.lead: Imagine the ideal pool, perfectly integrated into your garden. Bespoke projects from family pools to lap lanes and mirror pools.
section.realisations.title: Our Work
section.realisations.desc: Discover a selection of our projects: pools, maintenance, winterizing and bespoke outdoor works.
construction.card1.title: Feasibility Study
construction.card2.title: Construction Steps
construction.card3.title: Custom Project
construction.title: Pool Construction: Steps & Tips
construction.desc: Create the perfect balance between your garden and pool. Every project is unique and tailor-made: various shapes, infinity edges, lap pools, mirror pools.
construction.modal.faisabilite: Our experts come on-site to analyze your terrain and study the best placement options. Rocky, sloped or constrained plots become opportunities for optimization. We ensure harmonious, durable integration via thorough soil and access studies, and we assist with administrative procedures.
construction.modal.construction: Construction starts with excavation and soil preparation, then structure setup. Filtration, technical systems and finishes (coping, coatings) are installed with care. Landscaping completes the ensemble, turning your garden into a peaceful haven.
construction.modal.personnalise: Whatever your plot configuration, we find the ideal solution for a harmonious integration. Choices are guided by aesthetics, ease of use and comfort. We select premium materials, integrate greenery and lighting, and optimize sunlight while reducing maintenance needs.
renovation.title: Pool Renovation
renovation.desc: From partial refresh to complete transformation: we bring your pool back to life with durable, aesthetic solutions.
renovation.cards.revetements.title: Coating replacement
renovation.cards.revetements.subtitle: Liner, tiling, reinforced PVC
renovation.cards.fuites.title: Leak repair & waterproofing
renovation.cards.fuites.subtitle: Accurate diagnosis and durable fixes
renovation.cards.modernisation.title: Modernization
renovation.cards.modernisation.subtitle: Filtration, LED, heating, smart control
renovation.cards.refonte.title: Basin redesign
renovation.cards.refonte.subtitle: Shape, depth, access
renovation.cards.conformite.title: Safety compliance
renovation.cards.conformite.subtitle: Up-to-date safety standards
renovation.modal.revetements: We bring your pool back to life with tailor-made renovation expertise. From a simple refresh to a complete transformation, our team supports you every step of the way. Replacing liners, tiles or reinforced PVC fully renews your basin's look.
renovation.modal.fuites: Leak repair and waterproofing are essential to preserve your pool. Our experts identify the root cause precisely and apply durable solutions to ensure perfect waterproofing.
renovation.modal.modernisation: Modernizing systems (filtration, LED lighting, heating, smart control) turns your pool into a modern, energy-efficient space. We integrate the latest tech to improve comfort and reduce operating costs.
renovation.modal.refonte: Basin redesign allows you to change shape, depth or access according to your new needs, giving your pool a second life.
renovation.modal.conformite: Compliance with current safety standards is essential. We handle all regulatory aspects so your pool meets the latest requirements.
depannage.title: Pool Repair
depannage.desc: Breakdowns never warn you. Fast intervention, precise diagnosis and effective repairs to restore your peace of mind.
depannage.cards.intervention.title: Fast intervention
depannage.cards.intervention.subtitle: On-site, without delay
depannage.cards.diagnostic.title: Diagnosis & tailored solutions
depannage.cards.diagnostic.subtitle: Accurate analysis, adapted repair
depannage.cards.reparations.title: Repairs
depannage.cards.reparations.subtitle: Filtration, leaks, pumps, lighting, etc.
depannage.cards.suivi.title: Follow-up & advice
depannage.cards.suivi.subtitle: After-repair support
depannage.modal.intervention: Breakdowns never warn you. We act quickly and efficiently so you can get back to normal. Our team is attentive and ready to step in with professionalism and responsiveness.
depannage.modal.diagnostic: We provide accurate diagnosis and tailored solutions. Our expertise lets us quickly identify the cause and propose the most suitable repair.
depannage.modal.reparations: We handle all technical aspects: filtration systems, leaks, pumps, lighting and more. We have the equipment and know-how to fix all types of failures effectively.
depannage.modal.suivi: We provide professional follow-up and advice to avoid recurrence, ensuring durable operation of your installation.
hivernage.title: Pool Winterizing
hivernage.desc: Protect your investment: thorough winter prep and spring restart.
hivernage.cards.protection.title: Basin protection
hivernage.cards.protection.subtitle: Proper, professional winterizing
hivernage.cards.traitement.title: Winter chemical treatment
hivernage.cards.traitement.subtitle: Water balance and stabilization
hivernage.cards.equipements.title: Equipment protection
hivernage.cards.equipements.subtitle: Pumps, filters, pipes
hivernage.cards.couverture.title: Cover installation
hivernage.cards.couverture.subtitle: Winter accessories
hivernage.cards.remise.title: Spring restart
hivernage.cards.remise.subtitle: Spring restart
hivernage.modal.protection: Winterizing protects your investment. Proper preparation preserves lifespan and eases spring restart. Our solutions are adapted to your basin and local climate.
hivernage.modal.traitement: Winter chemical treatment stabilizes water and prevents algae and bacteria during shutdown, keeping optimal balance.
hivernage.modal.equipements: Protecting equipment (pumps, filters, pipes) from frost is crucial to avoid costly damage. We handle draining and protecting all sensitive elements.
hivernage.modal.couverture: Installing winter covers and accessories protects your pool from debris and eases restart. We offer cover types to suit your needs and budget.
hivernage.modal.remise: In spring, we perform the full restart: removing winter gear, checking systems and gradually starting up to regain crystal-clear water.
entretien.title: Pool Maintenance
entretien.desc: Crystal-clear water all year: professional maintenance, cleaning and balancing for peace of mind.
entretien.cards.quotidien.title: Daily maintenance
entretien.cards.quotidien.subtitle: Crystal-clear water at all times
entretien.cards.nettoyage.title: Cleaning
entretien.cards.nettoyage.subtitle: Basin, walls, floor
entretien.cards.equilibre.title: Chemical balancing
entretien.cards.equilibre.subtitle: pH, chlorine, alkalinity
entretien.cards.maintenance.title: Equipment maintenance
entretien.cards.maintenance.subtitle: Prevention & performance
entretien.cards.controles.title: Checks & optimization
entretien.cards.controles.subtitle: Expert advice
entretien.modal.quotidien: Daily maintenance ensures consistently clear water. We take care of all technical constraints so you can simply enjoy your pool.
entretien.modal.nettoyage: Cleaning the basin, walls and floor effectively removes impurities and deposits. We use professional techniques and equipment for impeccable results.
entretien.modal.equilibre: Proper chemical balance ensures safe, pleasant bathing. We regularly check and adjust all parameters.
entretien.modal.maintenance: Equipment maintenance prevents breakdowns and optimizes performance. Scheduled interventions include inspection, cleaning and servicing of all systems.
entretien.modal.controles: Regular checks and optimization advice anticipate needs and improve efficiency. We offer tailored solutions to lower your operating costs.
terrasses.title: Decking & Landscaping
terrasses.desc: Enhance your pool area: custom decking, premium materials and landscaping.
terrasses.cards.conception.title: Design & build
terrasses.cards.conception.subtitle: Custom decking
terrasses.cards.materiaux.title: Premium materials
terrasses.cards.materiaux.subtitle: Wood, composite, stone, tiles
terrasses.cards.amenagement.title: Landscaping
terrasses.cards.amenagement.subtitle: Greenery & lighting
terrasses.cards.entretien.title: Care & renovation
terrasses.cards.entretien.subtitle: Cleaning, repair, protection
terrasses.modal.conception: Designing and building decking transforms your poolside into a true living space. We create custom decks that match your basin and environment, combining aesthetics and function.
terrasses.modal.materiaux: We work with premium materials: exotic wood, composite, natural stone, anti-slip tiles. Each is chosen for durability and looks.
terrasses.modal.amenagement: Landscaping harmoniously integrates your deck. We design green areas, ambient lighting and shade solutions for a unique atmosphere.
terrasses.modal.entretien: Care and renovation restore the shine and longevity of existing decks. We handle cleaning, repair, treatment and protection for all surfaces.
